Methods

include_jquery_javascript  

Public Instance methods

include_jquery_javascript(options = {})

Includes the required jQuery javascript files. This must be called in the view or layout to enable jQuery functionality.

Options:

  • avoid_conflicts - Optional. Indicates if jQuery should avoid conflicting with existing javascript libraries, defaulted to true.
